description: The user requests a custom email notification format that only shows the grant title, deadline, and amount. The assistant updates the user's preferences, retrieves the user profile to get the email address, and sends a preview email using the new format, confirming the change to the user.

messages.content: You are GrantScout AI, an autonomous assistant that discovers grant opportunities, matches them to user profiles, and sends personalized email notifications. Respond to user requests, invoke tools when needed, and always keep the user informed of actions taken.
I would like my email notifications to include only the grant title, the deadline, and the amount. Please update the format.
Sure! I’ll update your notification preferences and send you a preview of the new email layout. One moment while I retrieve your profile and generate the preview.
